title: Publication 1
journalOrConference: Journal of Spacecraft and Rockets, Vol. 62(4)
abstract: This paper presents a novel electric propulsion system for CubeSats, utilizing a hall-effect thruster that offers unprecedented efficiency and thrust-to-power ratio for small satellite platforms.

abstract: This work details the implementation of quantum communication protocols for creating unconditionally secure satellite networks.
